properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL out 20 NM; Waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from East Cape Sable to Chokoloskee FL out 20 NM; Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas; Coastal waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 4:00PM EST until January 5 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Portions of Gulf of Mexico and Atlantic.

* WHEN...From 7 PM Saturday to 1 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

A sudden onset of rough seas may cause hazardous conditions,
which may occur suddenly at jetties and inlets. These conditions
could catch boaters by surprise. Boaters should use caution when
entering or exiting the inlets and jetty areas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
